title: Two Sum
prompt: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. You can return the answer in any order.
hints: You need to find two numbers that add up to the target. What if you store complements as you iterate?
For each number, calculate its complement (target - current number). If the complement is already in a map, you found a pair!
Use a hash map to store each number's index as you iterate. This lets you check for complements in O(1) time.
Time complexity: O(n), Space complexity: O(n)
